stroll through the cobbled streets of the medieval Old Town and remember the monarchs , religious zealots and literary giants who walked this way before you .来吧！在中世纪遗留下来的古镇那铺满鹅卵石的街道上徜徉，你会回想起那些曾经走过这条道路的帝王将相、宗教信徒和文坛巨匠。

derivation.yuyuan_name: mid 16th cent. (in the sense member of an ancient Jewish sect): via ecclesiastical Latin from Greek zēlōtēs, from zēloun 'be jealous', from zēlos (see zeal)

entry.tran: （尤指政治或宗教信仰方面的）狂热分子，极端分子
entry.def: If you describe someone as a zealot, you think that their views and actions are very extreme, especially in following a particular political or religious belief.

example.ex: He was forceful, but by no means a zealot.
example.tran: 他个性坚定，但绝不是什么狂热分子。

means.word_mean: 1. a fervent and even militant proponent of something

stems_affixes.word_buile: patri祖国[比喻成父亲]+ot名词字尾,表示人→n.爱国者,爱国主义者
pil+ot……人→意大利语piloto"划桨"的变体
zeal热心+ot……人→n.狂热分子,热心者
pil+ot……人→意大利语piloto"划桨"的变体
jeal=zeal热心+ous……的→对什么表示热心而无法得到,从而嫉妒
zeal热心+ous表形容词→adj.热心的,热情的
zeal热心+ot人→n.狂热分子,热心者

sentences.cn: 这位艺术热心者奉献他一生来完成一幅伟大的作品。
